rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0001
rows.name:
No matter what my parents say,
I'm going to become a botanist
in the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You know how Gula has lots of
trees, right? More than any other
country in the world, in fact!

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0003
rows.name:
So we make all sorts of things
out of wood. From furniture to
tools, it has all kinds of uses.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But in Superbia, they hardly
have any trees at all.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Apparently if it weren't for
the wood we export to them,
they might run out completely.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0006
rows.name:
As someone who grew up in Gula,
that makes me really sad. I can't
imagine living without trees.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0007
rows.name:
So I want to study botany in
Superbia, and do something
about their tree shortage.

rows.label: tlk41100124_02_msg0008
rows.name:
My dream is to make Superbia the
second most tree-covered country
in Alst! After Gula, of course!
